programme.title: MST3K: Hobgoblins
programme.desc: Mike and the Bots suffer through the story of tiny goblin-like creatures who attack a group of teenagers.

programme.title: MST3K: Samson Vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women (1962).

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger
programme.desc: The infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination.

programme.title: MST3K: The Final Sacrifice
programme.desc: With the help of a map and a drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta.

programme.title: MST3K: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
programme.desc: A family encounters cultists who use human hands as sacrificial offerings to their god.

programme.title: MST3K: The Mask
programme.desc: For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D!

programme.title: MST3K: Space Mutiny
programme.desc: Mike and the bots learn the 80s were worse than they thought as they endure the sci-fi epic, Space Mutiny.

programme.title: MST3K: Werewolf
programme.desc: After digging up strange bones, a man becomes a werewolf.

programme.title: MST3K: Laserblast
programme.desc: A teenager discovers a laser weapon left behind by turtle-like aliens.

programme.title: MST3K: The Pumaman
programme.desc: Constantly-Out-Of-His-League Man battles evil while Pearl hosts her Castle Forrester Ball.

programme.title: MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
programme.desc: Martians kidnap Santa and two children.

programme.title: MST3K: The Final Sacrifice
programme.desc: With the help of a map and a drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta.

programme.title: MST3K: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public TV pledge program.
